0.text: Bug 25150  [Dialogs] File property page has large vertical area on GTK.

1.text: Build 20021018  There are a number of problems with the way the properties are displayed  for files: 1.

2.text: The read-only text fields are displayed with a white background.

3.text: By  convention, a white background tells the user that a text field is  editable.

4.text: Non-editable text fields should be drawn with a gray background.

6.text: The text fields are not drawn with a border.

7.text: The combination of a white  background and no border makes the fields look sloppy.

9.text: The text fields are poorly sized.

10.text: The "Path:" and "Location:" fields are  too tall (vertically) and the "Last Modified: field is too thin  (horizontally).
